channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Loads of litter outside private garden, 6th November
item.description:
Residential litter left outside the side of my garden which reeks of rotting food. Please can we find a solution/ pick up the rubbish soon? I am conscious this will attract vermin quite soon.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southwold Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Report of Abandoned Car at Pixfield Court, 6th November
item.description:
I am reporting a van that has been parked at Pixfield Court for the past 2+months. It appears to be abandoned and is taking up valuable parking space that should be available for residents’ vehicles. Could this please be investigated and appropriate action taken? Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beckenham Lane, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shrub planted under tree is taking it over. PLEASE REMOVE, 6th November
item.description:
Council tree on Sandbrook Rd N16, outside Swift House. Someone planted a shrub under the tree which is now so large it’s nearly as big as the tree and must be taking water and nutrients from it. Please can you remove the shrub?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sandbrook Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Canisters dumped into recycle bin beside building, 6th November
item.description:

item.title: Tree roots Pushing pavement up and over hanging my property, 6th November
item.description:
The Tree Roots are pulling up the tarmac on the road as well as the pavement. Creating uneven, bumpy ground around the tree which is dangerous. The tree is also over hanging private properties. The Tree Looks like it hasn’t been cared for in many years. Also cars parked next to the tree on the road are unable to open car doors due to the large roots.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 48, May Avenue, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
